= How to compile on (Ubuntu) Linux? =

  # install netbeans
  # checkout (sdl brach)
  # install zlib
  # install boost (including signals and filesystem modules)
  # install sdl (with image and mixer module)
  # install ftgl and, at least in Ubuntu Linux 8.10 and higher, use next hack: "sudo ln -s /usr/include/freetype2/ freetype /usr/include/freetype")
  # compile and you're done

= Dependencies (Linux) =

  * libftgl-dev
  * libboost-signals-dev
  * libsdl-dev
  * libsdl-image-dev
  * libsage-dev
